name: Love letters
description:
Post-Valentine's update:

  • Add boundaries so you don't go off the side
  • Made player collision box slightly smaller
  • Added a floor
  • Adjust HUD - move score, tilt love letter/skull stacks
  • Slightly juiced up! Screen shakes, 5-stack feedback

---

Love letters are falling from the sky.

Grab as many as you can while avoiding the letters with skulls.

Get five love letters to boost your score.

Use the left/right arrow keys or touch and hold the left/right side of the screen to move.

A perfect time-waster for Valentine's Day (and beyond).

-----

Made with GDevelop.
